Component({
  data: {

	allList: [{

  attached() {
	  
	if(wx.getStorageSync('userInfo')){

		if(role == 2){ // è½¦ç®¡å‘˜

		}else if(role == 3){ // å¸æœº

  },
  methods: {

    },

	// åˆå§‹åŒ–èµ‹å€¼
	init() {

		}
	}
  }
})

<script>
import deliveryTimeOp from '@/components/delivery-time-op.vue'
export default {
  components: {
    deliveryTimeOp,
  },
  data(){
	return{
		
	}
  },
  mounted(){},
  methods{
			// æ—¶é—´
			getDliveryTime(){
				let today = '';
				let nextDay = '';
				let threeDay = ''
				let timeformatter = ''

				let now = new Date();
				// è·å–æ˜ŸæœŸ
				let week = now.getDay();
				let deliveryTimeList = [];
				// å¹´
				let Y = now.getFullYear();
				// æœˆä»½
				let M = now.getMonth() + 1;
				M = M < 10 ? "0" + M : M;
				// æ—¥
				let D = now.getDate();
				switch(week){
					case 0:
						today = "ä»Šå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨æ—¥ï¼‰";
						nextDay = "æ˜å¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨ä¸€ï¼‰";
						threeDay = "åå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨äºŒï¼‰";
						break;
					case 1:
						today = "ä»Šå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨ä¸€ï¼‰";
						nextDay = "æ˜å¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨äºŒï¼‰";
						threeDay = "åå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨ä¸‰ï¼‰";
						break;
					case 2:
						today = "ä»Šå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨äºŒï¼‰";
						nextDay = "æ˜å¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨ä¸‰ï¼‰";
						threeDay = "åå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨å››ï¼‰";
						break;
					case 3:
						today = "ä»Šå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨ä¸‰ï¼‰";
						nextDay = "æ˜å¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨å››ï¼‰";
						threeDay = "åå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨äº”ï¼‰";
						break;
					case 4:
						today = "ä»Šå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨å››ï¼‰";
						nextDay = "æ˜å¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨äº”ï¼‰";
						threeDay = "åå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨å…­ï¼‰";
						break;
					case 5:
						today = "ä»Šå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨äº”ï¼‰";
						nextDay = "æ˜å¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨å…­ï¼‰";
						threeDay = "åå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨æ—¥ï¼‰";
						break;
					case 6:
						today = "ä»Šå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨å…­ï¼‰";
						nextDay = "æ˜å¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨æ—¥ï¼‰";
						threeDay = "åå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨ä¸€ï¼‰";
						break;
				}
				
				// åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯20ç‚¹ä»¥å, 20ç‚¹ä»¥ååˆ™é»˜è®¤å€¼ä¸ºç¬¬äºŒå¤©ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª
				let endTimeStamp = new Date(new Date().setHours(20)).getTime()
				let nowStamp = new Date().getTime()
				
				if(nowStamp > endTimeStamp) {
					let todayStr = this.getTimeList('two');
					let nowDayList = this.getTimeObj(todayStr)
					let D1 = new Date(new Date().setDate(new Date().getDate() + 1)).getDate().toString()
					
					let todayYMD = Y + '-'+ M + '-' + D1.padStart(2, '0')
					
					deliveryTimeList.push({ timezh: nextDay, timeformatter: todayYMD, timelist: nowDayList });
					this.content = deliveryTimeList
					
					let nextDayStr = this.getTimeList('three');
					let nextDayList = this.getTimeObj(nextDayStr)
					
					let D2 = new Date(new Date().setDate(new Date().getDate() + 2)).getDate().toString()
					let nextYMD = Y + '-'+ M + '-' + D2.padStart(2, '0')
					deliveryTimeList.push({ timezh: threeDay, timeformatter: nextYMD, timelist: nowDayList });
					this.content = []
					this.content = deliveryTimeList
				} else {
					let todayStr = this.getTimeList('one');
					let nowDayList = this.getTimeObj(todayStr)
					
					let todayYMD = Y + '-'+ M + '-' + D.toString().padStart(2, '0')
					deliveryTimeList.push({ timezh: today, timeformatter: todayYMD, timelist: nowDayList });
					this.content = deliveryTimeList
					
					let nextDayStr = this.getTimeList('two');
					let nextDayList = this.getTimeObj(nextDayStr)
					let D2 = new Date(new Date().setDate(new Date().getDate() + 1)).getDate().toString()
					let nextYMD = Y + '-' + M + '-' + D2.padStart(2, '0')
					deliveryTimeList.push({ timezh: nextDay, timeformatter: nextYMD, timelist: nextDayList });
					this.content = []
					this.content = deliveryTimeList
					
				}
				
				this.chooseDate = this.content[0].timeformatter
				this.chooseDay = this.content[0].timezh
                this.chooseTime = this.content[0].timelist[0].timestr
			},
			// è·å–æ—¶é—´æ®µ
			getTimeList(type) {
				let timeListTodayAll = [];
				let timeList = []
				let startTime 
				
				let now = new Date()
				let tommorrow = new Date().setDate(new Date().getDate() + 1)
				let three = new Date().setDate(new Date().getDate() + 2)
				let todayStart = new Date().getFullYear() + '-' + (new Date().getMonth()+1).toString().padStart(2, '0') + '-' + new Date().getDate() + ' 09:00:00'
				
				let allTimes = (21 - 9) * 60 / 40
				for(let i = 0; i < allTimes; i++) {
					let setTodayTime = new Date(todayStart).setMinutes(40*i)
					timeListTodayAll.push(formatTime(setTodayTime))
					timeList.push(formatTime(setTodayTime).substring(11, 16))
				}
				if(type == 'one') {
					let nowTimeStamp = new Date().setMinutes(new Date().getMinutes() + 20)
					for(let j = 0; j < timeListTodayAll.length; j++) {
						let itemStamp = new Date(timeListTodayAll[j]).getTime()
						if(itemStamp >= nowTimeStamp) {
							timeList = timeList.slice(j)
							break
						}
					}
				}
				return timeList
			},
			// æ ¹æ®æ—¶é—´æ®µè½¬ä¸ºæ•°ç»„å¯¹è±¡
			getTimeObj(todayStr){
				// å°†æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„æ—¶é—´æ®µå­—ç¬¦ä¸²åˆ†å‰²
				let todayArr = []
				todayStr.forEach(item => {
					todayArr.push(...item.split('-'))
				})
				// å°†åˆ†å‰²åçš„æ•°ç»„å»é‡
				let todayDup = []
				todayArr.forEach(item => {
					if(todayDup.indexOf(item) == -1){
						todayDup.push(item)
					}
				})
				// å°†å»é‡åçš„æ•°ç»„è½¬ä¸ºæ•°ç»„å¯¹è±¡
				let todayList = []
				todayDup.forEach(item => {
					todayList.push({
						timestr: item
					})
				})
				return todayList;
			},

			// ç‚¹å‡»æ˜¾ç¤ºæ—¶é—´å¼¹çª—
			showModel(){
				this.model = true;
			},

			// é€‰æ‹©æ—¥æœŸçš„å›è°ƒ
			dataCallback(item,index){
				this.chooseDay = item.timezh
				this.chooseDate = item.timeformatter
			},

			// é€‰æ‹©æ—¶é—´çš„å›è°ƒ
			timeCallback(item,index){
				if(this.now == this.formData.chooseDate){
					this.chooseDay = this.content[0].timezh
					this.chooseDate = this.now
				}else{
					this.chooseDay = this.content[1].timezh
					this.chooseDate = this.content[1].timeformatter
				}

  onshow(){

<script>
import deliveryTimeOp from '@/components/delivery-time-op.vue'
export default {
  components: {
    deliveryTimeOp,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      // æ§åˆ¶æ˜¾ç¤ºéšè—
      model: false,
      // éœ€è¦ä¼ é€’å±•ç¤ºçš„æ—¥æœŸæ—¶é—´æ•°æ®
      content: [
        // {timezh: "",timeformatter: "", timelist: []},
      ],
      chooseTime: '',
      // æ—¶é—´
      chooseDay: '',
      //æ˜ŸæœŸ
	  chooseDate: '', // å¹´æœˆæ—¥
	  bhTxt: 'å°½å¿«å–è´§', // å–è´§æ—¶é—´æ–‡å­—
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.$nextTick(() => {
      this.getDliveryTime()
    })
  },
  methods: {
    // æ—¶é—´
    getDliveryTime() {
      let now = new Date();
      // è·å–æ˜ŸæœŸ
      let week = now.getDay();
      let today = '';
      // ä»Šå¤©æ˜ŸæœŸ æ–‡å­—
      let nextDay = '';
     // æ˜å¤©æ˜ŸæœŸ æ–‡å­—
      let timeformatter = ''
     // å¹´æœˆæ—¥
      let deliveryTimeList = []
	  // è·å–å½“å‰çš„æœˆä»½
      let M = now.getMonth() + 1
      M = M < 10 ? '0' + M : M
	  // è·å–å½“å‰çš„æ—¥
      let D = now.getDate()
      switch (week) {
        case 0:
          today = 'ä»Šå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨æ—¥ï¼‰'
          nextDay = 'æ˜å¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨ä¸€ï¼‰'
          break
        case 1:
          today = 'ä»Šå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨ä¸€ï¼‰'
          nextDay = 'æ˜å¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨äºŒï¼‰'
          break
        case 2:
          today = 'ä»Šå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨äºŒï¼‰'
          nextDay = 'æ˜å¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨ä¸‰ï¼‰'
          break
        case 3:
          today = 'ä»Šå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨ä¸‰ï¼‰'
          nextDay = 'æ˜å¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨å››ï¼‰'
          break
        case 4:
          today = 'ä»Šå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨å››ï¼‰'
          nextDay = 'æ˜å¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨äº”ï¼‰'
          break
        case 5:
          today = 'ä»Šå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨äº”ï¼‰'
          nextDay = 'æ˜å¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨å…­ï¼‰'
          break
        case 6:
          today = 'ä»Šå¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨å…­ï¼‰'
          nextDay = 'æ˜å¤©ï¼ˆå‘¨æ—¥ï¼‰'
          break
      }

      let timeDate = new Date(now.getTime() + 3600000);
      
	  // ä»Šå¤©çš„æ—¶é—´æ®µ
      let todayStr = this.getTimeList(
        timeDate.getHours(),
        timeDate.getMinutes()
      );
      let nowDayList = this.getTimeObj(todayStr);
	  // æ—¥ è¡¥é›¶
	  let dnum = D
	  dnum = dnum < 10 ? '0' + dnum : dnum;
	  // å¹´ æœˆ æ—¥
	  let todayYMD = Y + '-' + 'M' + '-' + dnum;
      deliveryTimeList.push({
        timezh: today,
        timeformatter: todayYMD,
        timelist: nowDayList,
      });
      this.content = deliveryTimeList;

      // æ˜å¤©çš„æ—¶é—´æ®µ
      let nextDayStr = this.getTimeList(9, 0);
      let nextDayList = this.getTimeObj(nextDayStr);
	  // æ—¥ è¡¥é›¶
	  let DNum = D + 1;
	  DNum = DNum < 10 ? '0' + DNum : DNum;
	  // å¹´ æœˆ æ—¥
	  let nextYMD = Y + '-' + M + '-' + DNum;
      deliveryTimeList.push({
        timezh: nextDay,
        timeformatter: nextYMD,
        timelist: nextDayList,
      });
      this.content = [];
      this.content = deliveryTimeList;
		
	  this.chooseDay = this.content[0].timezh
      this.chooseTime = this.content[0].timelist[0].timestr

    },
    // è·å–æ—¶é—´æ®µ
    getTimeList(hour, minut) {
      let timeList = [];
	  let times = 0;
	  let timei = 0;
      let startTime = hour < 9 ? 9 : hour;
      if (minut < 20) {
        for (let i = 0; i < 21 - startTime; i++) {
          for (let j = 0; j < 2; j++) {
            if (j % 2 === 0) {
              times = startTime + i;
			  times = times < 10 ? '0' + times : times;
			  timeList.push(
				 times + ":00" + "-" + (times) + ":20"
			  );

            } else {
              times = times = startTime + i;
			  times = times < 10 ? '0' + times : times;
			  timei = startTime + i + 1;
			  timei = timei < 10 ? '0' + timei : timei;
			  timeList.push(
				 times + ":40" + "-" + (timei) + ":00"
			   );

            }
          }
        }
      } else {
		times = 0;
		timei = 0;
        for (let i = 0; i < 21 - startTime; i++) {
          for (let j = 0; j < 2; j++) {
            if (j % 2) {
              if (i !== 20 - startTime) {
                times = startTime + i;
				times = times < 10 ? '0' + times : times;
				timei = startTime + 1 + i;
				timei = timei < 10 ? '0' + timei : timei;
				timeList.push(
					timei + ":00" + "-" + (timei) + ":20"
				);

              }
            } else {
              times = startTime + i;
			  times = times < 10 ? '0' + times : times;
			  timei = timei = startTime + i + 1;
			  timei < 10 ? '0' + timei : timei;
			  timeList.push(
				 times + ":40" + "-" + (timei) + ":00"
			  );
            }
          }
        }
      }
      return timeList
    },
    // æ ¹æ®æ—¶é—´æ®µè½¬ä¸ºæ•°ç»„å¯¹è±¡
    getTimeObj(todayStr) {
      // å°†æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„æ—¶é—´æ®µå­—ç¬¦ä¸²åˆ†å‰²
      let todayArr = []
      todayStr.forEach((item) => {
        todayArr.push(...item.split('-'))
      })
      // å°†åˆ†å‰²åçš„æ•°ç»„å»é‡
      let todayDup = []
      todayArr.forEach((item) => {
        if (todayDup.indexOf(item) == -1) {
          todayDup.push(item)
        }
      })
      // å°†å»é‡åçš„æ•°ç»„è½¬ä¸ºæ•°ç»„å¯¹è±¡
      let todayList = []
      todayDup.forEach((item) => {
        todayList.push({
          timestr: item,
        })
      })
      return todayList
    },
    // æ§åˆ¶å¼¹çª—æ˜¾ç¤º
    showModel() {
        this.model = true
    },
    // é€‰æ‹©æ—¥æœŸçš„å›è°ƒ
    dataCallback(item, index) {
      this.chooseDay = item.timezh
	  this.chooseDate = item.timeformatter
    },
    // é€‰æ‹©æ—¶é—´çš„å›è°ƒ
    timeCallback(item, index) {
       if(this.now == this.content[0].timeformatter){
			this.chooseDay = this.content[0].timezh
			this.chooseDate = this.now
		}else{
			this.chooseDay = this.content[1].timezh
			this.chooseDate = this.content[1].timeformatter
		}
		this.chooseTime = item.timestr
		
		if(this.chooseDay != this.content[0].timezh || this.chooseTime != this.content[0].timelist[0].timestr) {
			this.bhTxt = 'æŒ‡å®šæ—¶é—´'
		} else {
			this.bhTxt = 'å°½å¿«å–è´§'
		}
		this.model = false;
    },
    // éšè—äº‹ä»¶
    close() {
      this.model = false
    },
  },
  onshow(){
		let now = new Date();
		let year = now.getFullYear()
		let month = now.getMonth() + 1
		month = month < 10 ? "0" + month : month;
		let date = now.getDate() 
		date = date < 10 ? '0' + date : date
		this.chooseDate = `${year}-${month}-${date}`
		this.now = `${year}-${month}-${date}`
		this.getDliveryTime()
  },
}
</script>

<script>
	export default {
		props: {
			//æ§åˆ¶å¼¹çª—çš„éšè—æ˜¾ç¤º
			model: {
				type: Boolean,
				default: false
			},
			//å¼¹çª—æ ‡é¢˜
			title: {
				type: String,
				default: 'å¼¹çª—æµ‹è¯•'
			},
			//å¼¹çª—å†…å®¹
			content: {
				type: Array,
				default: [{
					content: 'æˆ‘æ˜¯å¼¹çª—å†…å®¹'
				}]
			},
			//å¼¹çª— çª—å£é«˜åº¦
			barHidth: {
				type: Number,
				default: 400
			},
			//ç‚¹å‡»æ¨¡æ€æ¡†æ˜¯å¦èƒ½å…³é—­å¼¹çª—
			showYes: {
				type: Boolean,
				default: false
			}
		},
		data() {
			return {
				scrollTop: 0,
				isIndex: 0,
				Indexes: 0,
				Days: [],
			}
		},
		mounted(){
			// åˆå§‹åŒ–
			this.Days = this.content[0].timelist;
		},

		methods: {
			// å…³é—­çª—å£
			showModal() {
				this.$emit('close', false)
			},
			// ç‚¹å‡»æ¨¡æ€æ¡†å…³é—­çª—å£
			Modal() {
				if (this.showYes) {
					this.$emit('close', false)
				}
			},
			//é…é€æ—¶é—´åˆ‡æ¢å›é¡¶
			gotop() {
				this.scrollTop = 1;
				this.$nextTick(function() {
					this.scrollTop = 0;
				});
			},

			//åˆ‡æ¢æ—¥æœŸ
			dataCallback(item,index) {
				this.isIndex = index;
				this.Days = this.content[index].timelist;
				this.Indexes = null;
				this.gotop();
				this.$emit('dataCallback', item, index)
			},

			//é€‰æ‹©æ—¶é—´
			timeCallback(item,index) {
				this.Indexes = index;
				this.modalName = null;
				this.$emit('timeCallback', item, index)
			},
		}
	}
</script>
